enrl_requirement:
Enrollment Requirements: Co-Requisite: Students must also register for Chemistry 102-0 01.
Add both classes to the shopping cart and submit together for successful registration.
title: WCAS CHEM 122-0-01 General Inorganic Chemistry Laboratory

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value:
Chemistry laboratory techniques applied to materials science and nanotechnology. Planning, data collection, interpretation, and reporting on experiments.

Chemistry 122-0 is the laboratory course associated with Chemistry 102-0. Students enrolled in Chemistry 102-0 must also enroll in Chemistry 122-0.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: Prerequisite: Grade of C- or better in Chemistry 101-0 and Chemistry 121-0.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
1. Turning Technologies Model QT or NXT Response Card ("Clicker")

Available Online (information to be provided during Week 1):

2. LabArchives Course Access

Items Below Available From The Chemistry Department:

3. 100% Cotton Laboratory Coat
4. Laboratory Safety Glasses

subject: CHEM
